name: Sand-Box type Game
description:
This is a Sand-Box-type game that also has open-source code which will be released by 1.0  of the game... If you guys have any suggestions on what to add just put them in the comments/discussion. Thanks for playing  :) 

-P3acan

Controls:

WASD - Move

Control - Crouch/Slide

Space - Jump

E - Pick Up Object

Left Click - Throw Object

Right Click - Dodge-Ball Gun

Q - Grapple Gun

F - Spawn Billy

B - Spawn Bat

M - Spawn Magic Carpet

P - Spawn Plane

Have Fun :D
